targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, platform, count(*) as requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY time, platform ORDER BY time

panels.title: 请求量趋势 - 按平台

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time, quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration) as p95_response_time, quantile(0.99)(total_request_duration) as p99_response_time FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT count(*) as total_requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT countIf(is_error = 1) * 100.0 / count(*) as error_rate FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT avg(total_request_duration) as avg_response_time FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT countIf(is_slow = 1) as slow_requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT api_category as "API类别", count(*) as "请求数", avg(total_request_duration) as "平均响应时间(ms)", quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration) as "P95响应时间(ms)", countIf(is_error = 1) * 100.0 / count(*) as "错误率(%)", countIf(is_slow = 1) as "慢请求数" FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY api_category ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT response_status_code as status_code, count(*) as count FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY response_status_code ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT business_unit FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_unit IS NOT NULL AND business_unit != ''
list.label: 业务系统
list.name: business_unit
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT business_unit FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE business_unit IS NOT NULL AND business_unit != ''

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE environment IS NOT NULL AND environment != '' AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
list.label: 环境
list.name: environment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT environment FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE environment IS NOT NULL AND environment != '' AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT api_name FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE api_name IS NOT NULL AND api_name != 'unknown' AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
